messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Back from RE Conference
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings, everyone, I ve been a lurker for a bit, really curious about unschooling.  I was also at the RE conference, and I also have to say that it was
messages.messageBody:
Greetings, everyone,

I've been a lurker for a bit, really curious about unschooling. I was also
at the RE conference, and I also have to say that it was fantastic! Someone
mentioned recently that "it was like someone installed a sun roof in my
head." Wonderful atmosphere, great kids, and a lot of dads. There was even
a couple of Dad's meetings at night, and I got so much out of that as well.


--Rob, Richardson, Tx
Devoted Husband to Seana
Excited Father to Genevieve (4) and Elissa (3)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
"Christy Putnam" <personal_balance@...> wrote:
>I won't go into details here (will write in my blog when I have more
time) but I highly recommend people start planning to attend next
years Rethinking Education (www.rethinkingeducation.com
http://www.rethinkingeducation.com/) conference NOW! It was soooo
wonderful to be surrounded by parents and grandparents (and hotel
staff) that have the utmost respect for children.>

Hi Christy!
Glad you had a great experience! Maybe you can share some of it!

I'm thinking of everyone in NM this week, wishing I was there,
hopefully next year (sounds like it MIGHT be back on the east coast)!
Jann

messages.subject: Back from RE Conference
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone!  We have been back since Monday evening and I am JUST now getting a chance to check in.  Boy and I glad I went No Mail cuz I would feel like I
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone! We have been back since Monday evening and I am JUST now
getting a chance to check in. Boy and I glad I went "No Mail" cuz I would
feel like I have to read every digest I received while I was gone...lol I
won't go into details here (will write in my blog when I have more time) but
I highly recommend people start planning to attend next years Rethinking
Education (www.rethinkingeducation.com <http://www.rethinkingeducation.com/>
) conference NOW! It was soooo wonderful to be surrounded by parents and
grandparents (and hotel staff) that have the utmost respect for children.
Hope everyone had a wonderful and safe Labor Day weekend!

In Gratitude,
Christy Putnam
Unschooling Mom to Seth (12) and Aden (19 mo.)
Loving wife of Chester (ann. 7/4/04)

Visit my blog &/or join my group:
<http://blog.myspace.com/personal_balance>
http://blog.myspace.com/personal_balance
<http://groups.myspace.com/unschoolingourfuture>
http://groups.myspace.com/unschoolingourfuture

"Go confidently in the direction of your
dreams. Live the life you have always
imagined." - Henry David Thoreau
